attributes.action: Look at ways to prevent TB in cattle which do not involve mass slaughter of badgers, one of our most wonderful wild creatures, and a symbol of all that is wise about Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do you Gordon Brown and the population of Britain currently living really wish to go down on history as the generation that sanctioned mass slaughter of this wonderful animal. Tb will NOT be prevented, and porbably not even reduced in cattle by this measure
